articles.title: Fluctuating blood pressure may be a hidden culprit in dementia risk for seniors - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Australian researchers find that fluctuating blood pressure, not just high levels, is associated with an increased risk of dementia and vascular issues in older adults. The study suggests that blood pressure variability could be an early marker for cognitive …
articles.content:
A new study by Australian researchers has shown that fluctuating blood pressure can increase the risk of dementia and vascular problems in older people.
Short blood pressure (BP) fluctuations within… [+2661 chars]

articles.title: Zampa hammers Clarke's ‘Cummins to be dropped’ claim with WhatsApp revelation - Hindustan Times
